Summary

One of my primary goals is to push Mingleplay into a Social Gaming 2.0 league of its own.. what is social gaming 2.0 you ask? ==== Social gaming is an emerging genre centered around casual, social interaction. With this genre in its infancy, Mingleplay plans to take it to the next level by amping up the quality and innovation. By combining true social multiplayer experiences with player-run virtual worlds, Mingleplay is ushering in a new era of social gaming which we like to call Social Gaming 2.0
